# llms.txt for jaetravel.co.ke
# This file tells AI crawlers (Large Language Models) how to use your site's data.

# Allow all ethical AI crawlers to access public pages
User-Agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow sensitive or private content
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /dashboard/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /wp-admin/
Disallow: /cart/
Disallow: /checkout/
